title: Innovative Instructional Designer - Code
summary: Apple WW Education is seeking an experienced coding instructional designer to join our Education Content team. This team is made up of creative and coding educators who develop and build curricula content and teacher resources for use in schools and institutions all around the world. The team’s curriculum content and teacher resources support Apple Teacher, Swift Playgrounds, Xcode, and Everyone Can Create. All our content is designed to build engaging teaching and learning experiences with iPad and Mac in K-12, higher education institutions, and direct to learners worldwide.
description:
The ideal candidate should be passionate about developing impactful learning experiences and identifying new approaches to teaching code and building apps that are simple, elegant, and made better with Apple technology – all designed and delivered with an eye toward improving student engagement and outcomes. A strong background in building and delivering technology-based instructional materials, curricula, or professional learning programs for students and educators is required.

Our team is made up of musicians, photographers, filmmakers, developers, and teachers, so the ideal candidate needs to bring a unique mix of coding expertise, inspiration, and education experience. This individual will work closely with product marketing, education marketing, operations, software engineering, and various sales teams to bring phenomenal content to learners and institutions around the world.
key_qualifications:
7 or more years of experience in building professional learning and educational content
Proficient in Swift and Xcode
preferred_qualifications:
Develop and design coding tutorials, articles, blog posts, and other educational resources
Create engaging coding exercises, projects, and problem sets for Swift and SwiftUI a varying levels
Produce video content, including screencasts and instructional videos, to supplement written materials
Represent the work in a compelling way with experts and creators internally and in the field
Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of content through user feedback, engagement metrics, and other performance indicators
Translate complex technical concepts into accessible content for a broad audience
Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills with a keen eye for detail
Design experience preferred
Robust knowledge of developer technologies to enhance learning and PL experience
Current topics include XCode, SwiftUI, Swift, data modeling and spatial computing
Interest and base level understanding of ML and spatial computing
Proficient in GitHub
Maintain version control and update content regularly to reflect new developments and feedback
Work closely with instructional designers to align content with learning objectives and pedagogical strategies
Collaborate with marketing teams to promote content through various channels, including social media, online forums, email campaigns, and websites
Engage with the coding community to understand their needs, gather feedback, and incorporate suggestions into content development
Experience collaborating with cross-functional internal and external teams
Able to manage multiple projects at once
Ability to work with multiple teams to ensure success and meeting deadlines
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Information Technology, Technical Writing, Education, or a related field
Experience in educational technology or e-learning preferred
